alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 10:06AM EST until March 02 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton. For the Patoka River...including Princeton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Thursday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 18.8 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
